Dear {!Contact.FirstName}
Compliance Week has partnered with Clear Law Institute to bring you a one-day seminar on The Science of Workplace Investigations. Our agenda is crafted to provide practical insights and best-practices.
In this hands on seminar you will learn:
*How to utilize the "Cognitive Interview," which is the most widely researched interviewing technique in the world *How to apply research-based methods for detecting signs of deception and truthfulness *The legal requirements for workplace investigations *A 6-step process for writing clear and concise investigative reports
This course has been approved for 7 CLE/CPE credits. Details below:
When: Tuesday, March 10, 2020 Where: Suffolk University, Boston MA Hours: 9 am to 4 pm EST Lunch on your own form 12 to 1 pm EST Networking Cocktail hour at 4 pm Cost: $799.00
We have a limited amount of space available, if you are interested in attending simply respond to my email. I will add you to the registration list and provide you with an invoice for the course.
Please feel free to call or email with any questions.
Thanks {!Contact.FirstName}, I look forward to seeing you in Boston!
Best Regards,
Donna
